fields.notesFormatted:
1 Corinthians 12

  1. A Spiritual Gift is - a God-given ability to serve others.

  2. God gives different gifts to different people for the common good.

    1 Corinthians 12:4-6

  3. Once we have a gift, we now have a position to play.

    Ephesians 2:10

1 Corinthians 13

  1. Agape love is not an optional quality.

    John 13:34-35, 1 John 4:7-8, Revelation 2:1-5

  2. Agape love is something we do, not something we feel.

    Matthew 5:43-44, Matthew 22:36-40

  3. Agape love puts the needs and interests of others first.

    John 3:1-17, Romans 13:8-10, Philippians 2:3-5
